com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase
Interface EntityMapper<K,E>

Type Parameters:
K - The underlying key record type.
E - The entity type
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseEntityMapper
public interface EntityMapper<K,E>

An interface for mapping HBase Result instances to a Key/Entity pair, and a Key/Entity to an HBase Put instances. EntityMapper instances should be state-less so they can be reused across multiple Result and Entity instances. They should encapsulate in one place the mapping of business entities to and from HBase.

Method Detail

mapToEntity

KeyEntity<K,E> mapToEntity(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result result)
Map an HBase Result instance to an Entity of type T. Retrieve the Key from the result instance as well, and wraps both in an KeyEntity instance. This KeyEntity instance is returned.

Parameters:
result - The HBase result instance representing a row from an HBase table.
Returns:
A KeyEntity instance which wraps a Key and an Entity of type T.

mapFromEntity

PutAction mapFromEntity(K key,
                        E entity)
Map a Key and an entity of type T to an HBase Put instance.

Parameters:
key - a key to use to construct the Put instance.
entity - The entity which this function will map to a Put instance.
Returns:
An HBase Put.

mapToIncrement

org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Increment mapToIncrement(K key,
                                                        String fieldName,
                                                        long amount)
Maps a Key, fieldName and an increment value to an HBase Increment instance that will increment the value in the cell pointed to by fieldName.

Parameters:
key - a key to use to construct the Increment instance.
fieldName - The name of the field we are incrementing
amount - The amount to increment the field by
Returns:
An HBase Increment

mapFromIncrementResult

long mapFromIncrementResult(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result result,
                            String fieldName)
Maps the result of an increment to the new value of the field that was incremented.

Parameters:
result - The HBase client Result object that contains the increment result
fieldName - The name of the field we are getting the increment result for
Returns:
The new field value.

Gets the set of required HBase columns that we would expect to be in the result.

Returns:
The set of required columns.
